IP202603_syn_1:
Indication: Mediastinal adenopathy.
Anesthesia: MAC, LMA.
EBUS: Sampled stations 7, 4R, 4L.
Technique: 22G/19G needles. 5 passes/station.
Result: 4R = Granuloma. Others pending.
Complications: None.
IP202603_syn_2:
PROCEDURE: Endobronchial Ultrasound-Guided Transbronchial Needle Aspiration (EBUS-TBNA).
CLINICAL SUMMARY: Evaluation of mediastinal lymphadenopathy.
DETAILS: Under MAC, the EBUS scope was introduced. Sonographic evaluation id[REDACTED] enlargement of subcarinal (7) and paratracheal (4R, 4L) stations. Systematic sampling was performed with 5 passes per station using 22G and 19G needles. ROSE evaluation of station 4R demonstrated granulomatous inflammation. The procedure was concluded without incident.
IP202603_syn_3:
Billing Code: 31653 (EBUS-TBNA 3+ stations).
Justification: Three distinct mediastinal nodal stations were sampled: Station 7, Station 4R, and Station 4L.
Technique: 5 passes per station to ensure adequacy. ROSE performed on 4R (Granuloma).
IP202603_syn_4:
Resident Note
Procedure: EBUS
Indication: Lymph nodes.
Steps:
1. LMA/Propofol.
2. White light exam normal.
3. EBUS scope in.
4. Found nodes at 7, 4R, 4L.
5. Stuck each one 5 times.
6. 4R showed granuloma.
7. Suctioned airway, all good.
IP202603_syn_5: ebus for lymph nodes propofol lma. airway looked normal. used the ebus scope to sample station 7 and 4r and 4l. did 5 passes at each one sent for cytology. rose said 4r was granulomas. no bleeding finished up.
IP202603_syn_6: The patient was sedated with propofol and an LMA was placed. We performed a standard inspection followed by EBUS. We id[REDACTED] and sampled lymph nodes at stations 7, 4R, and 4L. We performed five passes at each station. On-site pathology showed granulomas in station 4R. The airway was cleared of secretions and the patient was recovered.
IP202603_syn_7:
[Indication]
Mediastinal adenopathy.
[Anesthesia]
MAC, Propofol.
[Description]
EBUS-TBNA performed on 3 stations: 7, 4R, and 4L. 5 passes per station. ROSE: Granuloma in 4R.
[Plan]
Await final cytology.
IP202603_syn_8: We performed an EBUS bronchoscopy to investigate the patient's enlarged mediastinal lymph nodes. After inserting the LMA, we used the convex probe to locate nodes at stations 7, 4R, and 4L. We thoroughly sampled all three stations with multiple needle passes. Preliminary results from the 4R node indicate granulomatous disease.
IP202603_syn_9:
Procedure: EBUS-TBNA.
Targets: Subcarinal and bilateral paratracheal nodes.
Action: Stations 7, 4R, and 4L were aspirated. 5 excursions per target.
Findings: Granulomatous reaction noted in 4R.
